LanguageData.GameEndedWanderersJoin.label: wanderers join
LanguageData.GameEndedWanderersJoin.letterText: A few wanderers have stumbled across the remains of the colony and decided to stay.\n\nPerhaps they will be able to continue its story.

LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.label: man in black
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.letterText: Sensing trouble, a mysterious [PAWN_kind] has arrived.\n\nWill [PAWN_pronoun] be able to set things right in these parts?
